solution_line_template: Alexa and Emily spend a total of ${cost_lemons} + ${cost_sugar} + ${cost_cups} = $<<{cost_lemons}+{cost_sugar}+{cost_cups}={total_expenses}>>{total_expenses}.
They make a total of ${price_per_cup} x {cups_sold} = $<<{price_per_cup}*{cups_sold}={total_revenue}>>{total_revenue}.
